discussion.p: basic_socket::is_open() is noexcept, but the corresponding function on basic_socket_acceptor is not. This is a simple observer with a wide contract and cannot fail.
discussion.note: 2017-11-01 Moved to Tentatively Ready after 7 positive votes for P0 on c++std-lib.

resolution.p: This resolution is relative to N4656.

li.p: Edit , class template basic_socket_acceptor synopsis, as indicated:

blockquote.p: -10- Returns: A bool indicating whether this acceptor was opened by a previous call to open or assign.
